name: Gravity Drifter
description:
Gravity Drifter is a platformer endless runner with the focus on jumping and dashing in order to survive as long as you can while being chased by a hideous creature. Players have the the added luck of having to deal with a defense mechanism originally made to combat this creature but now pose an obstacle for you to maneuver through. 

We implemented the theme of "OUT OF CONTROL" by having the movement of the game ever changing due to the busted gravitational system on the ship. The player now has to adapt to, not only moving straight, but also climb vertically and falling in order to get away from their doom!
